org.ivar.leveltools.Properties

type
class
extends
Hash<String>

Constructor

public new(?node : haxe.xml.Fast)
Constructs the object and loads all the properties into the hash table. Both keys and values are strings (as this class extends Hash), but helper methods provide conversions to other basic types. It treats all nodes named prop and property as properties and reads their name and value attributes.
Parameters:
node - The node that contains all the properties.
Returns:
Nothing.

private h : flash.utils.Dictionary

inherited from Hash

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

public exists(key : String) : Bool

inherited from Hash
Tells if a value exists for the given key. In particular, it's useful to tells if a key has a null value versus no value.

public get(key : String) : Null<T>

inherited from Hash
Get a value for the given key.

public getBool(key : String, ?def : Bool) : Bool

Returns the value of a property as a boolean, or the default value. Values "1" and "true" are treated as true, everything else is treated as false.
Parameters:
key - name of the property.
def - default value that is returned if the key is not present.
Returns:
Value of the property.

public getFloat(key : String, ?def : Float) : Float

Returns the value of a property as a float, or the default value.
Parameters:
key - name of the property.
def - default value that is returned if the key is not present.
Returns:
Value of the property.

public getInt(key : String, ?def : Int) : Int

Returns the value of a property as an int, or the default value.
Parameters:
key - name of the property.
def - default value that is returned if the key is not present.
Returns:
Value of the property.

Returns the value of a property as a string, or the default value.
Parameters:
key - name of the property.

inherited from Hash

inherited from Hash

inherited from Hash
Removes a hashtable entry. Returns true if there was such entry.
